---
title: Cadence
subtitle: Number of steps per unit time
---


Normal cadence is the number of steps taken per unit of time @osullivanImprovingFunctionalOutcomes2016

# Normal Range

Normal range for cadence is 91 to 138 steps per minute @osullivanImprovingFunctionalOutcomes2016. 

# Increased Cadence

Increased cadence is accompanied by a shorter step length and decreased duration of the period of double support @osullivanImprovingFunctionalOutcomes2016. 

Running occurs when the period of double support disappears, typically at a cadence of 180 steps per minute.
